description.p: You have refined and tailored your natural charm to turn against your foes in combat, forcing them hesitate in their strikes by giving them pause for a split second. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When calculating your unarmored AC, you may add Charisma modifier to your AC. You can still use a shield and gain this benefit.
